Maximilian "Max" Siedentopf (amụrụ na 27 June 1991) bụ onye na-ese ihe na Namibia-German, onye na-emepụta ihe, onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na onye nduzi.  A maara ya maka ịtọ ntọala nke akpọrọ Toto Forever na Namib Desert nke nwere mgbanaka nke nnukwu blọk ọcha n'elu nke ndị ọkà okwu isii na-ejikọta na onye ọkpụkpọ MP3 na-eji ike anyanwụ eme ihe nke a haziri iji nọgide na-akpọ egwu 1982 Africa site n'aka ndị America Toto
E kpugheghi kpọmkwem ebe ihe ntinye ahụ dị.
Siedentopf tolitere n'obodo Windhoek na Namibia, ma na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ na Berlin, Los Angeles, Amsterdam, na London.  Ọ bụbu onye na-egwu mmiri asọmpi.

Na June 2019, Siedentopf pụtara na vidiyo egwu maka "Mine Right Now", abụ nke onye na-agụ egwu Norwegian Sigrid. Nke a bụ n'ihi na a kagbuola ụgbọ elu Sigrid, onye na-agụ egwu ahụ enweghị ike ịpụta na vidiyo ahụ n'onwe ya.
